data.name: DeleteStmtCouponSuppStatusHist
data.value: delete from CKT_STMT_SUP_ST_HS where (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (COLL_ID = @collId)

data.name: ReadCsePersonAccount
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC where (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (TYPE = 'R')

data.name: ReadStmtCouponSuppStatusHist
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, COLL_ID, TYPE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, OTY_ID, CPA_TYPE_OBLIG, CSP_NUMBER_OBLIG, OBG_ID from CKT_STMT_SUP_ST_HS where (COLL_ID = @collId) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (CSP_NUMBER_OBLIG is not null) and (CPA_TYPE_OBLIG is not null) and (OBG_ID = @obgId) and (OTY_ID = @otyId)
